metadata.title: CVE-2021-39887 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in the GitLab Flavored Markdownin GitLab CE/EE version 8.4 and above allowed an attacker to executearbitrary JavaScript code on the victim's behalf.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
